channel.title: About Nature Dave on NATURE.IN.PARADISE
channel.description: Recent content in About Nature Dave on NATURE.IN.PARADISE

item.title: Welcome to Paradise
item.description: SITE MAP A brief intro to Dave Klinges. An overview of my research program. Some of the news coverage of Nature Dave and collaborators. Film and photo products by Nature Studios. Musings related to research and conservation.

PAST LOCATIONS: Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute, Front Royal, VA. Madre de Dios, Peru. LUMCON, Cocodrie, LA One of the Gulf’s premiere research stations founded in 1979 Partnerships with Tulane, LSU, Nicholls U, and other schools Elevation in 2016: 3 ft above sea level Elevation in 2026: 5 ft below sea level Little Cayman, BWI one of the three Cayman Islands world-renowned for diving total permanent residential population: 17 beach: check.
